layout.name: movementScript
layout.title: Movement
layout.tooltip: LunaLua function to define and customize the movement, rotation and scale of the BGO. You can specify 'x', 'y', 'rotation', 'scaleX', 'scaleY' and 'opacity'.

layout.name: parallaxX
layout.title: Parallax X
layout.tooltip: How quickly the BGO scrolls with the camera horizontally. 0 means no movement, 1 is moving with the scene, and you can use anything in between.

layout.name: parallaxY
layout.title: Parallax Y
layout.tooltip: How quickly the BGO scrolls with the camera vertially. 0 means no movement, 1 is moving with the scene, and you can use anything in between.

layout.name: pivotX
layout.title: Pivot X
layout.tooltip: The horizontal centre used for rotation, scaling and parallax.

layout.name: pivotY
layout.title: Pivot Y
layout.tooltip: The vertical centre used for rotation, scaling and parallax.
